amendment.description: To appropriate as additional appropriations $7,800,000,000 for the Army and $5,300,000,000 for the Marine Corps for the reset of equipment due to continuing combat operations and to designate such amounts as emergency requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4751 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S8528; text: CR S8528) To appropriate as additional appropriations $7,800,000,000 for the Army and $5,300,000,000 for the Marine Corps for the reset of equipment due to continuing combat operations and to designate such amounts as emergency requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4751 proposed by Senator Stevens.
